statements: SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT date, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 50
SELECT energy_consumption FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE wind_speed BETWEEN 5 AND 10
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature < 20
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 50 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT AVG(temperature), AVG(humidity) FROM weather_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT date, temperature, wind_speed FROM weather_data WHERE energy_consumption > 500 ORDER BY wind_speed ASC, date DESC;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity, wind_speed, energy_consumption FROM weather_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND wind_speed < 10 ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC, humidity ASC, date ASC;
SELECT AVG(temperature), MAX(humidity), MIN(wind_speed) FROM weather_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m') ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_weather_data;
SELECT city_name, temperature FROM historical_weather_data ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT city_name, date, temperature, humidity FROM historical_weather_data WHERE city_name = 'New York';
SELECT city_name, date, temperature FROM historical_weather_data WHERE temperature > 80 AND humidity < 60 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT city_name, energy_type, consumption_amount FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_type = 'Electricity';
SELECT city_name, temperature FROM historical_weather_data WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT city_name, date AS weather_date, temperature, humidity FROM historical_weather_data WHERE city_name = 'New York'
SELECT city_name, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM historical_weather_data GROUP BY city_name ORDER BY avg_temp DESC
SELECT city_name, SUM(temperature) AS total_temp FROM historical_weather_data GROUP BY city_name HAVING total_temp > 100
SELECT city_name, consumption_date AS date, energy_type, consumption_amount FROM energy_consumption WHERE consumption_amount > 500 ORDER BY consumption_date DESC
SELECT * FROM weather_data;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(humidity) AS min_humidity FROM weather_data;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT system_id, system_type, efficiency FROM heating_cooling_systems WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT date, temperature, humidity, weather_condition FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT system_id, system_type FROM heating_cooling_systems WHERE efficiency > 0.8 ORDER BY system_id ASC;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity, weather_condition FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 0.4 AND temperature < 20 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT timestamp, energy_usage, power_consumption FROM energy_consumption WHERE building_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT system_id, system_type, installation_date, status FROM heating_cooling_systems WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY installation_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT id, date FROM heating_systems WHERE efficiency > 0.8
SELECT id, system_type, efficiency FROM cooling_systems WHERE efficiency < 0.5
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT location, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_usage > 100 GROUP BY location
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT location, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption WHERE location='New York' ORDER BY energy_usage DESC

SELECT system_type, efficiency FROM heating_systems JOIN cooling_systems ON heating_systems.location = cooling_systems.location WHERE heating_systems.efficiency > 0.9 AND cooling_systems.efficiency > 0.8
SELECT w.date, w.temperature, e.energy_usage FROM weather_data w JOIN energy_consumption e ON w.date = e.date WHERE w.temperature < 20 ORDER BY w.date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT location, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE date = '2022-09-15'
SELECT date, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT location, system_type FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_usage < 100 ORDER BY location
SELECT * FROM CoolingSystems WHERE efficiency > 0.8
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT location, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM WeatherData GROUP BY location;
SELECT EnergyConsumption.location, energy_usage, system_type FROM EnergyConsumption INNER JOIN HeatingSystems ON EnergyConsumption.system_type = HeatingSystems.system_type;
SELECT date, location, optimization_type FROM EnergyOptimization WHERE DATE(date) = CURDATE();
